title: The Hunter That Eats Artifacts - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adventurers   Appearance Changes   Artifacts   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Cheats   Conditional Power   Determined Protagonist   Dungeons   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Grinding   Hunters   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Strong to Stronger   Weak to Strong
author: Hwaun
description:
A sudden message came to my sight!

Beep-

[The predator's power is activated.]
[You can now consume artifacts.]

What? I can eat artifacts?

Didn't you say that I could die if I ate it wrong?

Beep-

[You've eaten an artifact.]>
